missions.title: Double Up
missions.description: Completing this mission unlocks additional Double Up missions

objectives.description: 3-star a champion in a game of Double Up
Send @quantity@ champion to your Double Up partner
Trade @quantity@ item with your Double Up partner
Get 100 points. After winning player combat, gain 1 point per The Crew champion, plus 2 more for each 3-star.
Win @quantity@ player combats with a Mentor
Win @quantity@ player combats with Mentor 4 active
Have the Mighty Mech deal @quantity@ damage
Field a champion with at least 5,000 health
Field a Level 30 Kogmaw, Rammus, or Smolder from Monster Trainer's effect
Execute @quantity@ enemies with the Supreme champion
Win a player combat with Juggernaut Lee Sin
Win a player combat with Executioner Lee Sin
Win a player combat with Duelist Lee Sin
Have Seraphine do a total of @quantity@ magic damage
Field a champion with at least 10 Mana Regen
Use @quantity@ Spatulas or Frying Pans to craft items
